title: Bug 102623: Image cannot be refreshed after re-importing
description: When importing a new image into the layout and attempting to refresh the image, the original image is still displayed instead of the new one.
OB: 1. Image cannot be refreshed after importing a new image into the layout.
EB: 1. After importing a new image into the layout, the new image should be displayed when refreshing, but the original image is still shown.
SR: 1. Import a new image (e.g., image1.jpg) into the layout.  2. Refresh the image. The new image should be displayed, but instead, the original image is still shown.
